song_name: Metal Gear Solid - Peace Walker Main Theme
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Metal Gear Solid - Peace Walker Main Theme is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Metal Gear Solid - Peace Walker Main Theme has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♯ Minor,  and G♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
